info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 28 at 2:32AM CDT until July 28 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL LEE COUNTY... At 232 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Amboy, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dixon, Amboy, Franklin Grove, Ashton, Sublette, Woodhaven Lakes, Eldena, Lee Center and Nachusa. This includes... Lee County Fairgrounds. Including the following interstate... I-88 between mile markers 54 and 69. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
